title: Looking for a specific Club/TAG
body:
As the title says, i am looking for a specific club which has a TAG that i am after.
Is there anyway too search for a club that has the TAG Lunar or do i have to wait until i come across someone in game with it?

Tried to create a club and use the TAG-Lunar but its taken sadly :(
So now i am on the hunt as a Diana main too find the Lunar.
Please send help! <3
